post.description: This API is used to upload the required payment details for the verification

parameters.name: cf_payment_id
parameters.description: Successful payment id for the created order.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: client id generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-client-secret
parameters.description: client secret generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used. Format is in YYYY-MM-DD

file.description: Attach file for the given doc_name if input_type is DOCUMENT

doc_value.description: Pass the doc value for the given doc_name if input_type is VALUE

doc_name.description: Required doc name for the given payment

doc_value.summary: Sample using doc_value as a string

remarks.example: Doc is waiting to be uploaded

added_on.description: Date and time at which the doc requirement was added

last_updated_on.description: Date and time at which the doc was uploaded

remarks.example: Doc is waiting to be uploaded

added_on.description: Date and time at which the doc requirement was added

last_updated_on.description: Date and time at which the doc was uploaded

get.description: Use this API to GET the status of the payment verification

parameters.name: cf_payment_id
parameters.description: Successful payment id for the created order.

cf_payment_id.description: Successful payment id for the created order

payment_expiry.description: Date and time at which the payment will expire if the required docs are not uploaded

remarks.example: Transaction reject due to invalid doc
Doc is waiting to be uploaded

added_on.description: Date and time at which the doc requirement was added

last_updated_on.description: Date and time at which the doc was uploaded

get.description: This API is used to get ICA settlement details using PG Order ID

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: client id generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-client-secret
parameters.description: client secret generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used. Format is in YYYY-MM-DD

cf_order_details.description: Contains information about the order related to the settlement

cf_payment_id.description: Unique payment ID associated with the order

order_amount.description: Total order amount in numeric value

payment_time.description: Time when payment for the order was processed

cf_ica_settlement_details.description: Contains information about the settlement transaction

service_charge_inr.description: Service charge in INR, if applicable

settlement_charges_inr.description: Charges related to the settlement in INR

settlement_forex_rate.description: Exchange rate used for conversion to settlement currency

settlement_amount.description: Amount in the foreign currency after conversion

payment_from.description: Start time of the payment period

payment_till.description: End time of the payment period

settlement_utr.description: Unique transaction reference (UTR) for the settlement

initiated_on.description: Date and time when the settlement was initiated

settled_on.description: Date and time when the settlement was completed

post.description: This API is used to fetch all events happened for provided Settlement IDs

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for fetching settlement recon details

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: client id generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-client-secret
parameters.description: client secret generated from the merchant dashboard

parameters.name: x-api-version
parameters.description: API version to be used. Format is in YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for fetching settlement recon details

start_date.description: Start date for fetching settlement recon details

end_date.description: End date for fetching settlement recon details

cf_ica_settlement_ids.description: List of ICA Settlement IDs for fetching related recon events

settlement_utrs.description: List of ICA Settlement UTRs for fetching corresponding recon events

limit.description: Limit on number of entries to fetch

cursor.description: Cursor from which entries to be fetched
Cursor for pagination, used to fetch the next set of results

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return per page

event_type.description: Type of the event (e.g., PAYMENT, REFUND)

event_settlement_amount.description: Amount related to the settlement of the event

event_status.description: Status of the event (e.g., SUCCESS, FAILURE)

order_id.description: Unique identifier for the order associated with the event

customer_name.description: Name of the customer associated with the event

payment_time.description: Time when the payment was processed

payment_service_charge.description: Service charge applied to the payment

payment_service_tax.description: Tax applied to the service charge

payment_utr.description: Unique transaction reference for the payment

cf_ica_settlement_id.description: Unique ID for the settlement associated with the event

settlement_utr.description: Unique transaction reference for the settlement

refund_note.description: Notes related to any refund issued

refund_arn.description: ARN (Acquirer Reference Number) for the refund

refund_processed_at.description: Date and time when the refund was processed

closed_in_favor_of.description: Indicates if the case was closed in favor of any party

resolved_on.description: Date and time when the dispute or issue was resolved

dispute_category.description: Category of the dispute, if applicable

dispute_note.description: Notes related to the dispute, if applicable

dispute_resolved_on.description: Date and time when the dispute was resolved

adjustment_remarks.description: Any remarks regarding adjustments made to the event

service_tax.description: Tax on the service, if applicable

service_charge.description: Charge for the service, if applicable

amount_settled.description: Amount that has been settled for the event

payment_from.description: Start time of the payment period

payment_till.description: End time of the payment period

reason.description: Reason for the event or transaction

settlement_initiated_on.description: Date and time when the settlement was initiated

settlement_settled_on.description: Date and time when the settlement was completed

payment_group.description: Payment group used for the transaction (e.g., UPI, Credit Card)

remarks.description: Additional remarks related to the event
